text:
Table ADMISSIONS. Columns: SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, ADMITTIME:TIMESTAMP(6), DISCHTIME:TIMESTAMP(6), DEATHTIME:TIMESTAMP(6), ADMISSION_TYPE:VARCHAR2, ADMIT_PROVIDER_ID:VARCHAR2, ADMISSION_LOCATION:VARCHAR2, DISCHARGE_LOCATION:VARCHAR2, INSURANCE:VARCHAR2, LANGUAGE:VARCHAR2, MARITAL_STATUS:VARCHAR2, RACE:VARCHAR2, EDREGTIME:TIMESTAMP(6), EDOUTTIME:TIMESTAMP(6), HOSPITAL_EXPIRE_FLAG:NUMBER. Primary keys: HADM_ID.
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table CAREGIVER. Columns: CAREGIVER_ID:VARCHAR2. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table CHARTEVENTS. Columns: SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, STAY_ID:NUMBER, CAREGIVER_ID:NUMBER, CHARTTIME:TIMESTAMP(0), STORETIME:TIMESTAMP(0), ITEMID:NUMBER, VALUE:VARCHAR2, VALUENUM:BINARY_DOUBLE, VALUEUOM:VARCHAR2, WARNING:NUMBER. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table DATETIMEEVENTS. Columns: SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, STAY_ID:NUMBER, CAREGIVER_ID:NUMBER, CHARTTIME:TIMESTAMP(3), STORETIME:TIMESTAMP(3), ITEMID:NUMBER, VALUE:TIMESTAMP(3), VALUEUOM:VARCHAR2, WARNING:NUMBER. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table DIAGNOSES_ICD. Columns: SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, SEQ_NUM:NUMBER, ICD_CODE:CHAR, ICD_VERSION:NUMBER. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table D_ICD_DIAGNOSES. Columns: ICD_CODE:CHAR, ICD_VERSION:NUMBER, LONG_TITLE:VARCHAR2. Primary keys: ICD_CODE, ICD_VERSION.
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table D_ICD_PROCEDURES. Columns: ICD_CODE:CHAR, ICD_VERSION:NUMBER, LONG_TITLE:VARCHAR2. Primary keys: ICD_CODE, ICD_VERSION.
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table D_ITEMS. Columns: ITEMID:NUMBER, LABEL:VARCHAR2, ABBREVIATION:VARCHAR2, LINKSTO:VARCHAR2, CATEGORY:VARCHAR2, UNITNAME:VARCHAR2, PARAM_TYPE:VARCHAR2, LOWNORMALVALUE:NUMBER, HIGHNORMALVALUE:NUMBER. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table D_LABITEMS. Columns: ITEMID:NUMBER, LABEL:VARCHAR2, FLUID:VARCHAR2, CATEGORY:VARCHAR2. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table EMAR. Columns: SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, EMAR_ID:VARCHAR2, EMAR_SEQ:NUMBER, POE_ID:VARCHAR2, PHARMACY_ID:NUMBER, ENTER_PROVIDER_ID:VARCHAR2, CHARTTIME:TIMESTAMP(0), MEDICATION:CLOB, EVENT_TXT:VARCHAR2, SCHEDULETIME:TIMESTAMP(0), STORETIME:TIMESTAMP(0). Primary keys: EMAR_ID, EMAR_SEQ.
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table EMAR_DETAIL. Columns: SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, EMAR_ID:VARCHAR2, EMAR_SEQ:NUMBER, PARENT_FIELD_ORDINAL:VARCHAR2, ADMINISTRATION_TYPE:VARCHAR2, PHARMACY_ID:NUMBER, BARCODE_TYPE:VARCHAR2, REASON_FOR_NO_BARCODE:CLOB, COMPLETE_DOSE_NOT_GIVEN:VARCHAR2, DOSE_DUE:VARCHAR2, DOSE_DUE_UNIT:VARCHAR2, DOSE_GIVEN:VARCHAR2, DOSE_GIVEN_UNIT:VARCHAR2, WILL_REMAINDER_OF_DOSE_BE_GIVEN:VARCHAR2, PRODUCT_AMOUNT_GIVEN:VARCHAR2, PRODUCT_UNIT:VARCHAR2, PRODUCT_CODE:VARCHAR2, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR2, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION_OTHER:VARCHAR2, PRIOR_INFUSION_RATE:VARCHAR2, INFUSION_RATE:VARCHAR2, INFUSION_RATE_ADJUSTMENT:VARCHAR2, INFUSION_RATE_ADJUSTMENT_AMOUNT:VARCHAR2, INFUSION_RATE_UNIT:VARCHAR2, ROUTE:VARCHAR2, INFUSION_COMPLETE:VARCHAR2, COMPLETION_INTERVAL:VARCHAR2, NEW_IV_BAG_HUNG:VARCHAR2, CONTINUED_INFUSION_IN_OTHER_LOCATION:VARCHAR2, RESTART_INTERVAL:CLOB, SIDE:VARCHAR2, SITE:VARCHAR2, NON_FORMULARY_VISUAL_VERIFICATION:VARCHAR2. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table ICUSTAYS. Columns: SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, STAY_ID:NUMBER, FIRST_CAREUNIT:VARCHAR2, LAST_CAREUNIT:VARCHAR2, INTIME:TIMESTAMP(0), OUTTIME:TIMESTAMP(0), LOS:NUMBER. Primary keys: STAY_ID.
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table INGREDIENTEVENTS. Columns: SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, STAY_ID:NUMBER, CAREGIVER_ID:NUMBER, STARTTIME:TIMESTAMP(0), ENDTIME:TIMESTAMP(0), STORETIME:TIMESTAMP(0), ITEMID:NUMBER, AMOUNT:NUMBER, AMOUNTUOM:VARCHAR2, RATE:NUMBER, RATEUOM:VARCHAR2, ORDERID:NUMBER, LINKORDERID:NUMBER, STATUSDESCRIPTION:VARCHAR2, ORIGINALAMOUNT:NUMBER, ORIGINALRATE:NUMBER. chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table INPUTEVENTS. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table LABEVENTS. Columns: LABEVENT_ID:NUMBER, SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, SPECIMEN_ID:NUMBER, ITEMID:NUMBER, ORDER_PROVIDER_ID:VARCHAR2, CHARTTIME:TIMESTAMP(0), STORETIME:TIMESTAMP(0), VALUE:VARCHAR2, VALUENUM:BINARY_DOUBLE, VALUEUOM:VARCHAR2, REF_RANGE_LOWER:BINARY_DOUBLE, REF_RANGE_UPPER:BINARY_DOUBLE, FLAG:VARCHAR2, PRIORITY:VARCHAR2, COMMENTS:VARCHAR2. chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table MICROBIOLOGYEVENTS. Columns: MICROEVENT_ID:NUMBER, SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, MICRO_SPECIMEN_ID:NUMBER, ORDER_PROVIDER_ID:VARCHAR2, CHARTDATE:TIMESTAMP(0), CHARTTIME:TIMESTAMP(0), SPEC_ITEMID:NUMBER, SPEC_TYPE_DESC:VARCHAR2, TEST_SEQ:NUMBER, STOREDATE:TIMESTAMP(0), STORETIME:TIMESTAMP(0), TEST_ITEMID:NUMBER, TEST_NAME:VARCHAR2, ORG_ITEMID:NUMBER, ORG_NAME:VARCHAR2, ISOLATE_NUM:NUMBER, QUANTITY:VARCHAR2, AB_ITEMID:NUMBER, AB_NAME:VARCHAR2, DILUTION_TEXT:VARCHAR2, DILUTION_COMPARISON:VARCHAR2, DILUTION_VALUE:NUMBER, INTERPRETATION:VARCHAR2, COMMENTS:CLOB. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table OUTPUTEVENTS. Columns: SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, STAY_ID:NUMBER, CAREGIVER_ID:NUMBER, CHARTTIME:TIMESTAMP(3), STORETIME:TIMESTAMP(3), ITEMID:NUMBER, VALUE:BINARY_DOUBLE, VALUEUOM:VARCHAR2. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table PATIENTS. Columns: SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, GENDER:CHAR, ANCHOR_AGE:NUMBER, ANCHOR_YEAR:NUMBER, ANCHOR_YEAR_GROUP:VARCHAR2, DOD:DATE. Primary keys: SUBJECT_ID.
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table POE. Columns: POE_ID:VARCHAR2, POE_SEQ:NUMBER, SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, ORDERTIME:TIMESTAMP(0), ORDER_TYPE:VARCHAR2, ORDER_SUBTYPE:VARCHAR2, TRANSACTION_TYPE:VARCHAR2, DISCONTINUE_OF_POE_ID:VARCHAR2, DISCONTINUED_BY_POE_ID:VARCHAR2, ORDER_PROVIDER_ID:VARCHAR2, ORDER_STATUS:VARCHAR2. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table PRESCRIPTIONS. Columns: SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, PHARMACY_ID:NUMBER, POE_ID:VARCHAR2, POE_SEQ:NUMBER, ORDER_PROVIDER_ID:VARCHAR2, STARTTIME:TIMESTAMP(3), STOPTIME:TIMESTAMP(3), DRUG_TYPE:VARCHAR2, DRUG:VARCHAR2, FORMULARY_DRUG_CD:VARCHAR2, GSN:VARCHAR2, NDC:VARCHAR2, PROD_STRENGTH:VARCHAR2, FORM_RX:VARCHAR2, DOSE_VAL_RX:VARCHAR2, DOSE_UNIT_RX:VARCHAR2, FORM_VAL_DISP:VARCHAR2, FORM_UNIT_DISP:VARCHAR2, DOSES_PER_24_HRS:BINARY_FLOAT, ROUTE:VARCHAR2. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table PROCEDUREEVENTS. Columns: SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, STAY_ID:NUMBER, CAREGIVER_ID:NUMBER, STARTTIME:TIMESTAMP(0), ENDTIME:TIMESTAMP(0), STORETIME:TIMESTAMP(0), ITEMID:NUMBER, VALUE:BINARY_DOUBLE, VALUEUOM:VARCHAR2, LOCATION:VARCHAR2, LOCATIONCATEGORY:VARCHAR2, ORDERID:NUMBER, LINKORDERID:NUMBER, ORDERCATEGORYNAME:VARCHAR2, ORDERCATEGORYDESCRIPTION:VARCHAR2, PATIENTWEIGHT:BINARY_DOUBLE, ISOPENBAG:NUMBER, CONTINUEINNEXTDEPT:NUMBER, STATUSDESCRIPTION:VARCHAR2, ORIGINALAMOUNT:BINARY_DOUBLE, ORIGINALRATE:BINARY_DOUBLE. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table PROCEDURES_ICD. Columns: SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, SEQ_NUM:NUMBER, CHARTDATE:DATE, ICD_CODE:VARCHAR2, ICD_VERSION:NUMBER. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}

Table SERVICES. Columns: SUBJECT_ID:NUMBER, HADM_ID:NUMBER, TRANSFERTIME:TIMESTAMP(0), PREV_SERVICE:VARCHAR2, CURR_SERVICE:VARCHAR2. Primary keys: .
chart_spec: {"chart_type": "table"}
